description: This file defines the interface IOttServices for the WPEFramework Exchange namespace, specifying several pure virtual functions related to service ping, permission retrieval, invalidation, and cache update.

classes.name: IOttServices
classes.description: An interface for OttServices, providing methods for pinging, permission management, and cache control.

methods.name: Ping
methods.description: Echoes a message and provides a reply string.

methods.name: GetPermissions
methods.description: Retrieves the permissions for a specified application ID.

methods.name: InvalidatePermissions
methods.description: Invalidates cached permissions for a given application ID.

methods.name: UpdatePermissionsCache
methods.description: Updates permission cache for a specific application ID and returns the number of permissions updated.
